room_title: Escape room "Mad Mind VR" by ZScape Games in Livermore
room_address: 2110 Omega Rd Suite E, San Ramon, CA 94583
room_description: Become a team of detectives from the future and go deep into the memories of a maniac to investigate the mysterious kidnapping of a child. Work together to solve diabolical and dangerous puzzles and uncover all of the secrets held in the mind of a madman.
